document_data.name: Elisia
document_data.mainbody: '''Elisia''' was a sea spirit who lived in [[Lac Dinneshere]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The [[elf|elven-like]] water spirit had blue skin and light green hair.
document_data.Relationships: Elisia loved the great hero [[Aihonen]], and felt very strong feelings toward his descendant, [[Jhonen]], because of his resemblance to Aihonen. However, the sea spirit feared revealing herself to Jhonen for risk of transforming into water.
document_data.History:
Around [[1181 DR]], Aihonen died while fighting [[Icasaracht]], the last [[white dragon]] queen of the [[Spine of the World]] on the banks of Lac Dinneshere.

In [[1281 DR]], Elisia communicated to Jhonen through dreams how she felt about the young fisherman. Later, she gave him the shards of the [[Blade of Aihonen]].
